name: MAZE! (itch)
description:
A simple game with a randomly generated maze that changes each time you play. The end is always set to the furthest point away from the start. Along the way, you can search for and collect coins. To change the challenge, you can resize the length and width of the maze from 4 to 20.

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow Keys/WASD and the mouse to move
  • M - Show menu to reset and resize the maze
  • R - Reset maze with current size settings
  • H - Hide help text
